title: Arms Dealer v8
description:
"As a new arms dealer in the year 2025 you will bribe generals, build relationships, and trade over 300 real weapons. Hunted by 4 law enforcement agencies and compete with the top 10 arms dealers. You must find the best deals, rarest weapons and most useful vehicles to carry your goods."

Changelog:
v8:
- Item transactions will now load from a saved game properly on the item transaction menu.
- Fixed a crash with loading a previously bribed public transportation after loading a save game.
- Pressing hotkeys while typing input should no longer open up their menu.
- Can no longer press escape to close new transport naming menu.
- Pressing escape to close a menu should no longer cause problems for menus later in the game.
- Fixed the crash that happened from encountering an Arms Dealer shortly after earning a wanted status.
- Reduced the RAM usage by about 40 MB.
- Can now take weapons out of a country's warehouse that you travel to after loading a saved game.
v7:
- Item transactions will now load from a saved game properly on the item transaction menu.
- Fixed a crash with loading a previously bribed public transportation after loading a save game.
- Pressing hotkeys while typing input should no longer open up their menu.
- Can no longer press escape to close new transport naming menu.
- Pressing escape to close a menu should no longer cause problems for menus later in the game.
- Fixed the crash that happened from encountering an Arms Dealer shortly after earning a wanted status.
- Reduced the RAM usage by about 40 MB.
- Can now take weapons out of a country's warehouse that you travel to after loading a saved game.
